main event: A UFO sighting was recorded in Ypsilanti, Michigan on January 15, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6 seconds.,The observed object had the appearance of marble or milky plaster with things on the side of it.,The document notes that the information is limited, making evaluation impossible.,Only one object was reported.,The observation was classified as aerial-visual.
sighted object: object with the appearance of marble or milky plaster
